description: IFC's Regional Departments are responsible for the overall strategy in their respective regions and client relations.  They also handle IFC's relationships with the relevant member countries' governments and local stakeholders-NGOs, media, and communities. Learn more at http://www1.ifc.org/wps/wcm/connect/region__ext_content/regions/regions/regions+landing+page .
